Text: "Knight"...?
...? Do you... not remember who I am?
I feel like I should know you...
...Hmm, I see what's happening now...
A phenomenon like this... is quite interesting.
──{playername}, apparently we are the only two people in here.
But there's some people around taking a walk...
Ah, by that I meant... "people we know of".
Seems there's no possibility of {playername}'s friends to come here.
How do you know that?
Fufu... I don't know what kind of being is doing this nor what this place is for──
But it seems that it couldn't get into the deepest level of my subconsciousness which usually lies dormant.
...If it intends to hurt {playername}, then a strict correction will be needed. But if it's just playing around, then I'll look over it.
...Or perhaps this is an opportunity to make my wishes come true. In order to make memories with him...
{playername}, you are a personal friend of mine so I have a favor to ask you...
Please play "House" with me.
"House"?
Yeah. I learned it from your little friends, Mimi, Misogi and Kyouka.
...How about it?
Fufu, I am glad.
Then let's go to your house right away. Oh, before that we'll go to a shopping street first.
It's a married couple's shopping date♪
Married couple?
Yes. The most common relationship between a man and a woman is called a "married couple", isn't it?
Even if we're just playing house, we shouldn't deviate too far from the rules.
But I don't even know your name...
Ah, sorry about that... Hmm, that's true...
Then, here's my human name. I am called "Barakieru".
Feel free to call me "Eru".
Yes, Darling♪
Then let's start from... shopping for dinner.
In Gio Teogonia, I can immediately find eatable mud balls or flowers... I suppose that's not the case here.
Are you good at cooking?
A little.
Fufu, then I'll be looking forward to it...♪
Rather than that...
Why are you holding my arm?
Well we're married couples on a date♪
If I have to tell you more about my reasons right now... {playername} and Princess Pecorine would surely be suspicious of me, also...
It has been awhile since I last placed my feet on the ground. It'd be terrible if I were to to fall the ground and ruined the food we bought.
What are we buying?
On this occasion, I would like to eat a dish called "Hotpot".
Putting varied ingredients in a single big pot and sharing it with everyone... Doesn't that sound just like a happy family?
Then we should start with a vegetable shop.
Vegetable shop...This store specializes in vegetables.
Cabbage, green onions, carrots... What else do we need?
You there, are you making a hotpot tonight? Don't forget about mushrooms! Enoki and Nishitake mushrooms are guaranteed to make your hotpot full of flavors!
Fufu, then I'll buy some.
Yes, no problem! ...Hm? Now that I take a closer look...
